title: Software Development Engineer
details: Led development of the Expedia Group Console, a unified platform for travel ecosystem integration
Built and maintained Lodging Connectivity platform enabling real-time synchronization with partner systems
Implemented unified login system with OAuth2/OIDC standards for cross-brand authentication
Developed with React, TypeScript, Apollo GraphQL, and Kotlin on AWS infrastructure
Mentored junior developers and contributed to architectural decisions

title: Sr. Associate Software Engineer
details: Developed CIB Identity Services for unified authentication across JP Morgan portals
Built Trading Operations content management system with advanced data visualization
Implemented secure authentication solutions using IAM and JWT tokens
Worked with React, TypeScript, Java Spring Boot, and AWS cloud services
Ensured WCAG compliance and accessibility standards for all applications

title: Software Engineer
details: Developed Government Shutdown Loan application for Consumer Lending Origination Experience (CLOE)
Built secure dual-facing web application for both member and internal use
Implemented automated loan processing workflows with React and Node.js
Ensured accessibility compliance with JAWS screen reader testing
Utilized Redux for state management and comprehensive testing with Jest and Cucumber

title: Software Engineer
details: Developed West Customer Portal for cloud-based customer experience solutions
Built WISDOM platform for IVR call flow testing and scenario management
Implemented solutions for healthcare, education, utilities, and commercial industries
Used React, Node.js, Hapi.js, and Redux with PCF cloud deployment
Focused on improving customer interaction and productivity tools

title: Software Engineer
details: Created Image Asset Search Engine for centralized asset retrieval across Target
Built solutions to aggregate assets from various teams, channels, and storage systems
Developed using Ember.js, Node.js, and Go Lang with MongoDB backend
Implemented infrastructure automation with Terraform, Ansible, and OpenStack
Collaborated with design teams using Adobe InDesign for asset management

title: Software Engineer
details: Developed CORAL Content Management Platform for business users
Implemented COPE (Create Once Publish Everywhere) content strategy
Built platform supporting multiple enterprise teams and entry points
Used Java, J2EE, Spring MVC, and Angular.js with RESTful APIs
Integrated with MongoDB, Oracle 11g, and Jackrabbit CMS

title: Software Engineer
details: Developed GENBAND Software Center (GSC) web-based application
Provided customers with software download capabilities for supported hardware
Built solution using Java, J2EE, JSF PrimeFaces, and Spring MVC
Implemented Oracle JDBC integration and LDAP authentication
Deployed on GlassFish application server
